languages.text: "Просто чтобы ты знал, казначей, прежде я следил{mf||а} за тем, чтобы всякий губернатор на вверенных мне мирах платил десятину исправно, и за малейшую недостачу я карал{mf||а} по всей суровости Лекс Империалис".

"Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Просто чтобы ты знал, казначей, прежде я следил{mf||а} за тем, чтобы всякий губернатор на вверенных мне мирах платил десятину исправно, и за малейшую недостачу я карал{mf||а} по всей суровости Лекс Империалис".

languages.text: « Trésorier, je tiens à vous faire savoir qu'autrefois, mon devoir était de m'assurer que chaque gouverneur de chaque planète placée sous ma responsabilité paie sa dîme en temps et en heure. Le moindre manquement était alors puni selon les préceptes de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Trésorier, je tiens à vous faire savoir qu'autrefois, mon devoir était de m'assurer que chaque gouverneur de chaque planète placée sous ma responsabilité paie sa dîme en temps et en heure. Le moindre manquement était alors puni selon les préceptes de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: 「出納係、念のために言っておく。{mf|俺|私}のかつての任務は、監督下にある全ての惑星の総督に、必ず租税を納めさせることだった。たとえわずかな不足でも、レックス・インペリアの条文に則り厳格に処罰した」
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「出納係、念のために言っておく。{mf|俺|私}のかつての任務は、監督下にある全ての惑星の総督に、必ず租税を納めさせることだった。たとえわずかな不足でも、レックス・インペリアの条文に則り厳格に処罰した」

languages.text: "Bildin olsun hazinedar: Geçmişte vazifem, gözetimim altındaki her dünyanın valisinin aşarı eksiksiz ödemesini sağlamaktı. En küçük bir eksiklik bile Lex İmperialis'in kelamına uygun şekilde cezalandırılırdı."
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Bildin olsun hazinedar: Geçmişte vazifem, gözetimim altındaki her dünyanın valisinin aşarı eksiksiz ödemesini sağlamaktı. En küçük bir eksiklik bile Lex İmperialis'in kelamına uygun şekilde cezalandırılırdı."

languages.text: «Para que quede claro a la tesorería: en el pasado, mi labor era asegurarme de que el gobernador de cada mundo bajo mi jurisdicción pagara el diezmo sin dilación, y se castigó hasta el más mínimo defecto tal como dicta la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Para que quede claro a la tesorería: en el pasado, mi labor era asegurarme de que el gobernador de cada mundo bajo mi jurisdicción pagara el diezmo sin dilación, y se castigó hasta el más mínimo defecto tal como dicta la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: “如你所知，财务官，我过去的职责，就是确保辖区内所有世界的总督都会按时按额缴纳什一税。哪怕是最微不足道的短缺，也会招致帝国律法的严厉惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “如你所知，财务官，我过去的职责，就是确保辖区内所有世界的总督都会按时按额缴纳什一税。哪怕是最微不足道的短缺，也会招致帝国律法的严厉惩罚。”

languages.text: "Nur, damit Ihr es wisst, Schatzmeister: In der Vergangenheit war es meine Pflicht, sicherzustellen, dass die Gouverneure aller Welten unter meiner Aufsicht den Zehnt verlässlich entrichten, und selbst die kleinste Nachlässigkeit wurde mit der ganzen Härte des Lex Imperia bestraft."
languages.original_text: "Just so you are aware, treasurer: in the past, my duty was to ensure that the governor of every world under my watch paid the tithe without fail, and even the smallest shortage was punished in full accordance with the letter of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Nur, damit Ihr es wisst, Schatzmeister: In der Vergangenheit war es meine Pflicht, sicherzustellen, dass die Gouverneure aller Welten unter meiner Aufsicht den Zehnt verlässlich entrichten, und selbst die kleinste Nachlässigkeit wurde mit der ganzen Härte des Lex Imperia bestraft."
